10#ifndef INCLUDED_LORA_SDR_STANDALONE_RX_CHAIN_H
11#define INCLUDED_LORA_SDR_STANDALONE_RX_CHAIN_H
12
13#include <gnuradio/lora_sdr/api.h>
14
15#include <cstddef>
16#include <complex>
17#include <optional>
18#include <vector>
19
20#include <liquid/liquid.h>
21
22namespace gr {
23namespace lora_sdr {
24namespace experimental {
25
26using complex_type = std::complex<float>;
27using complex_vector = std::vector<complex_type>;
28
29/*!\brief Simple container that mimics a GNU Radio vector source block. */
30class LORA_SDR_API vector_source
31{
32public:
33 vector_source();
34 explicit vector_source(complex_vector samples);
35
36 void set_samples(const complex_vector& samples);
37 void set_samples(complex_vector&& samples) noexcept;
38
39 const complex_vector& samples() const noexcept;
40 bool empty() const noexcept;
41
42private:
43 complex_vector d_samples;
44};
45
46/*!\brief Applies a configurable window to complex samples. */
47class LORA_SDR_API window_block
48{
49public:
50 enum class window_type { rectangular, hann, hamming, blackmanharris };
51
52 window_block();
53 window_block(size_t size, window_type type = window_type::hann);
54
55 size_t size() const noexcept;
56 window_type type() const noexcept;
57
58 void set_size(size_t size);
59 void set_type(window_type type);
60
61 const std::vector<float>& coefficients() const noexcept;
62
63 complex_vector process(const complex_vector& input) const;
64
65private:
66 void compute_coefficients();
67
68 size_t d_size;
69 window_type d_type;
70 std::vector<float> d_coeffs;
71};
72
73/*!\brief Thin wrapper around liquid-dsp FFT plans. */
74class LORA_SDR_API liquid_fft_block
75{
76public:
77 liquid_fft_block();
78 explicit liquid_fft_block(size_t fft_size);
79 ~liquid_fft_block();
80
81 size_t size() const noexcept;
82 bool is_configured() const noexcept;
83
84 void configure(size_t fft_size);
85
86 complex_vector process(const complex_vector& input);
87
88private:
89 void destroy_plan();
90
91 size_t d_fft_size;
92 fftplan d_plan;
93 std::vector<liquid_float_complex> d_time_domain;
94 std::vector<liquid_float_complex> d_frequency_domain;
95};
96
97/*!\brief Computes the magnitude of complex FFT bins. */
98class LORA_SDR_API magnitude_block
99{
100public:
101 std::vector<float> process(const complex_vector& input) const;
102};
103
104/*!\brief Finds the dominant spectral peak above a configurable threshold. */
105class LORA_SDR_API peak_detector_block
106{
107public:
108 struct peak_info {
109 size_t index = 0U;
110 float value = 0.0F;
111 };
112
113 peak_detector_block(float threshold = 0.0F, bool relative = false);
114
115 float threshold() const noexcept;
116 bool relative() const noexcept;
117
118 void set_threshold(float threshold) noexcept;
119 void set_relative(bool relative) noexcept;
120 void configure(float threshold, bool relative) noexcept;
121
122 std::optional<peak_info> process(const std::vector<float>& magnitudes) const;
123
124private:
125 float d_threshold;
126 bool d_relative;
127};
128
129/*!\brief Output bundle for the standalone receive chain. */
130struct LORA_SDR_API rx_result
131{
132 complex_vector input;
133 complex_vector windowed;
134 complex_vector spectrum;
135 std::vector<float> magnitude;
136 std::optional<peak_detector_block::peak_info> peak;
137};
138
139/*!\brief High level, self-contained receive pipeline built from the blocks above. */
140class LORA_SDR_API standalone_rx_chain
141{
142public:
143 struct config {
144 size_t fft_size = 0U;
145 window_block::window_type window = window_block::window_type::hann;
146 float peak_threshold = 0.0F;
147 bool relative_threshold = false;
148 bool normalize_magnitude = true;
149 };
150
151 explicit standalone_rx_chain(const config& cfg);
152
153 void set_config(const config& cfg);
154 const config& get_config() const noexcept;
155
156 rx_result process(const complex_vector& input);
157
158 window_block& window() noexcept;
159 const window_block& window() const noexcept;
160
161 peak_detector_block& detector() noexcept;
162 const peak_detector_block& detector() const noexcept;
163
164private:
165 config d_cfg;
166 vector_source d_source;
167 window_block d_window;
168 liquid_fft_block d_fft;
169 magnitude_block d_magnitude;
170 peak_detector_block d_detector;
171};
172
173} // namespace experimental
174} // namespace lora_sdr
175} // namespace gr
176
177#endif /* INCLUDED_LORA_SDR_STANDALONE_RX_CHAIN_H */
